name: Delicious food
description: This restaruant has a simple but delicious menu that leaves you inspired by the chefs' talents.

name: Good food bad experience
description: Food was up to my standards, was left wanting more from the service.
service: Orders were incorrect and allergies ignored.
taste: Though it was wrong, it definitely was good.

name: Good experience bad food
description: Location is nice and show is intertaining, food is not my favorite.
service: Good service, staff was friendly and delightful.
quality: Quality of food puts a damper on the quality of everything else this place has to offer.
